702103f-a.title: Bronx: Tremont Avenue (West - Loring Place
702103f-a.text:
195 W. Tremont Avenue, at the northwost corner of Loring Place,
showing the stable of th large Hugh N, Camp estate. A six-story
building, bearing the above street number, was later erected on
the site. TheCamp Mansion stood to the east of the stable, at
the northwest corner of Andrews and Ta.emont Avenues.
E. P. Chrystie  May 30, 1923
CgiIT LINE IMPERATIVE

701410f-a.title: Bronx: Loring Place South - Tremont Avenue (West)
701410f-a.text:
1820-1830 Loring Place South, adjoining the N.E. corner of West
Tremont Ave., showing the Louis Arms.
1928.
Brown Brothers..
